headline: Former Ny Times Editor Criticizes Papers Unmistakably Anti Trump Bias
summary:
Former New York Times executive editor Jill Abramson criticizes the paper's "unmistakably anti-Trump bias" in her new book, writing that the Times has embraced an increasingly liberal bent for financial gain. This story was widely covered by right-leaning publications and ignored by left-leaning outlets.

NOTE: At AllSides, we highlight multiple types of biases in the media, including which stories publications choose to feature and/or omit.
